name: Video Meanies
overview: You are a maintenance robot who works in a video shop located in a castle. It is your job to switch off the all the videos that have been left on by His Lordship. The game is a flick-screen maze game where you must explore each screen for a video machine to switch off. There are Meanies wandering the maze and will try to kill you. Touch one and you lose one of six lives. There are also walls that need to destroying to make a path as well as certain parts of a screen require a key to enter. As well as the main playing area you can see your score, lives and a jigsaw puzzle and you get pieces for it for every video turned off. Complete the jigsaw and you have completed the game.
